text:
e="preserve">Max Azria (Hebrew: מקס עזריה; Arabic: ماكس عزرية) (January 1, 1949 – May 6, 2019) was a Tunisian-American fashion designer.
Biography.
He founded the contemporary women's clothing brand BCBGMAXAZRIA. Azria was also the designer, chairman and CEO of the BCBG Max Azria Group. He was born Sfax, Tunisia.
Azria died on May 6, 2019 in Houston, Texas from lung cancer at the age of 70.
